instructions: Identify the following objects in the video frames and include them in the objects field. Be specific about their appearance, color, location, and other relevant attributes.

objects.name: Basketball
objects.description: Orange spherical ball used in the game, typically with black lines/grooves

objects.name: Basketball Court
objects.description: Wooden floor with markings including three-point line, free throw line, and center circle

objects.name: Scoreboard
objects.description: Digital or physical display showing game time, score, and other statistics

objects.name: Basketball Hoop
objects.description: Orange metal rim with white net attached to a backboard

objects.name: Backboard
objects.description: Clear rectangular board behind the hoop, often with team or league logos

objects.name: Jersey
objects.description: Team uniform top worn by players, note the color and number

objects.name: Basketball Shoes
objects.description: Specialized athletic footwear worn by players, often with team colors

objects.name: Referee Uniform
objects.description: Black and white striped shirt worn by officials

objects.name: Crowd
objects.description: Spectators in the stands watching the game

objects.name: Bench Area
objects.description: Seating and area for team members not currently playing
